id: Aesthetic Student Dashboard - Semester Planner/Tracker  | Aesthetic Notion Template Download
name: Aesthetic Student Dashboard - Semester Planner/Tracker  | Aesthetic Notion Template Download
description: + Notion template for high school/college/university students or anyone taking a course!+ Get better grades by staying organised+ Organise everything in your 'locker': classes, lecture notes, homework, coursework, exams, review topics & quizzes + grades+ Save time getting your notes set-up with pre-made lecture note templates+ Never be caught off guard and see what's coming up on your calendar+ Revise for exams quicker and easier by having all your notes in one place+ Easily share your notes

creator.name: The Notion Bar by Frances Odera Matthews
